title: Trump looks to remove homeless people from streets
shortDescription: President Trump wants to make it easier for cities and states to move homeless people to treatment centers under new executive action.

title: Here's where Trump's children have gone to college
shortDescription: All of Donald Trump's four eldest children went to one of two universities. His youngest, Barron Trump, is currently attending New York University.

title: Judge blocks Trump executive order on voting
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked Donald Trump's attempt to require proof of citizenship on voter registration forms.

title: GOP senators call for special counsel to probe Obama and his staff
shortDescription: GOP Sens. Lindsey Graham and John Cornyn are calling for a special counsel to investigate whether Obama was involved in undermining Trump's 2016 bid.

title: 'MAGA all the way': Trump mourns wrestler Hulk Hogan's death
shortDescription: Trump has longstanding ties to professional wrestling and his relationship with Hogan goes back decades.

title: Trump looks to disband homeless camps across US with new order
shortDescription: President Trump wants to make it easier for cities and states to move homeless people to treatment centers under new executive action he's taking.

title: Is Trump in the Epstein files? What we knew before Bondi's memo
shortDescription: WSJ and CNN reported that Pam Bondi had told Trump he was mentioned in the government files on Jeffrey Epstein. But it doesn't imply wrongdoing.

title: Hulk Hogan's political support for President Donald Trump in photos
shortDescription: Hulk Hogan was a key supporter during Trump's campaign for office, but the two have known each other long before the president's time as president.

title: Donald Trump’s Scotland trip creates division
shortDescription: Trump’s visit to Scotland draws backlash as protesters link him to Epstein with a sign outside his Aberdeen golf course.

title: Trump halts Obama-era plan to limit trucker highway speeds
shortDescription: The Trump administration scrapped an Obama-era proposal to cap the speed of big rigs and buses on US highways due to increased costs and traffic congestion.

title: Trump says he want Musk to 'THRIVE' after threatening subsidy cuts
shortDescription: Elon Musk's companies have benefited from government contracts, including SpaceX through its relationships with the Pentagon and NASA.

title: Trump to visit Fed Reserve, ramping up pressure campaign on Powell
shortDescription: President Trump's trip to the Federal Reserve marks just the fourth time a president has visited the Fed, which operates as an independent agency.

title: DOGE-proof: Congress moves to protect nuclear weapons workers
shortDescription: The Senate draft of a defense policy bill would reclassify National Nuclear Security Administration employees.

title: TACO or tariffs? Trump's big trade deadline is coming: What to know
shortDescription: A slew of countries will face steep levies, including a 50% tariff on imports from Brazil and a 30% tariff on the European Union.

title: Trump says more deals with colleges are 'upcoming'
shortDescription: After striking $220 million deal with Columbia University, Trump indicated his efforts to overhaul elite universities are ongoing.

title: Trump USDA to relocate most DC-area staff around country
shortDescription: Moving the Agriculture Department from Washington to regional hubs is part of Trump's effort to cut the size and footprint of the federal government.

title: Saving lives or raising costs? Trump kills Obama-era speed limit plan
shortDescription: Limiting trucks to no more than 65 mph might have saved lives and fuel costs, but Trump administration says it would raise costs and stall traffic.
